title: Artichoke crostini
ingredients: ['280g jar marinated artichokes, well drained and coarsely chopped', '2 large tomatoes, seeded and coarsely chopped', '50g stoned black olives, coarsely chopped', '2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley', '1 tbsp olive oil', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1/2 ciabatta loaf', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
